Detailed Description

This takes a mask, and blurs its edge by the specified radius.

Whether or or not to include the original mask, and whether the blur goes outside, inside, or straddles, the original mask's border, is controlled by the Blur enum.

Member Enumeration Documentation






      

        

          enum gaia::graphics::BlurMaskFilter::Blur
        

      







The style config of blur effect. 


Enumerator: 


NORMAL 

blur inside and outside of the original border 




SOLID 

include the original mask, blur outside 




OUTER 

just blur outside the original border 




INNER 

just blur inside the original border
